response.overview: Rock star Tommy Lee, of Motley Cr√ºe fame, at last finds time for college after living the fast life for two decades. In his 40s, twice divorced and the single father of two boys, Lee could do the typical midlife crisis thing -- buying sports cars and dating young women. But he wants something different that money can't buy: academic redemption. It won't be class as usual when the student is Tommy Lee, as each of the six episodes finds him floundering in a new fish-out-of-water situation -- including quintessential collegiate challenges such as finding a roommate, trying out for the marching band and cramming for finals.
response.title: tommy lee goes to college
